author: admin
title: Buhari's health sparks fresh debate on leadership in Nigeria - Vanguard
text: Buhari's health sparks fresh debate on leadership in Nigeria - Vanguard Vanguard The protracted absence on medical grounds of Nigeria’s President Muhammadu Buhari has stoked fears of a full-blown political crisis at the heart of Africa’s most populous nation. The 74-year-old former army general left Abuja for London on January 19, …
